Message:
Her labored breaths grew
more and more shallow...

With the last of her strength,
she placed her hand
on my cheek.

She whispered in my ear
as her eyelids
slowly fluttered shut.

The brim of my hat suddenly slumped over my eyes,
as if it was telling me not to look if I couldn’t bear to.
Maybe it would’ve been easier that way.
But, my teacher’s words kept ringing in my head.

I gently reached for my hat.
The magic hat
that always gave me strength.

My precious treasure
filled with my
teacher’s hopes for me...

Please, lend me your power
once more.

Pulling my hat down,
I took a deep breath.
